content.description: <math alttext="N 2 O 4 gas is in equilibrium with 2 N O 2 gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>â‡„</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>
content.question: The graph above represents the data collected under certain conditions for the decomposition of <math alttext="N 2 O 4 gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> according to the chemical equation above. Based on the graph, at approximately which time is equilibrium established?

choices.label: At time <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because <math alttext="N 2 O 4 gas" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math> is expanding to fill the container.

At time <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because the reaction is reversible and <math alttext="the molar concentration of N O 2 equals the molar concentration of N 2 O 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>.

At time <math alttext="C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because the reaction is about to reach completion and <math alttext="the molar concentration of N O 2 is greater than the molar concentration of N 2 O 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>.

At time <math alttext="D" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>D</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because there are no observable changes in <math alttext="the molar concentration of N O 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="the molar concentration of N 2 O 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: At time <math alttext="D" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>D</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because there are no observable changes in <math alttext="the molar concentration of N O 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="the molar concentration of N 2 O 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: 6.D: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using chemical principles or laws, or using mathematical justification.
